name: Dollhouse (itch) (MagicChickenStudios)
description:
You’ve been trapped in the Dollhouse!
You are a realtor who has just purchased a foreclose property. Checking out the house that’s been built on the land, you suddenly find yourself locked in. With only a flashlight to light your way, you must explore the house and solve puzzles…all while being stalked by a killer doll. Can you figure out the mystery and escape, or will you be doomed to play with the dolls forever…
Features:
  • A large house to explore and investigate
  • A creepy doll that stalks your every move
  • 10ish minutes of gameplay
Controls: WASD to move Shift to run 1 for flashlight E to interact and pick up items Q to examine items
Make sure to leave your feedback below! Hope you enjoy :)
If you could fill out this form after playing I’d greatly appreciate it!
